text: Asante Twi uses tone (high and low) to distinguish meanings; different tone patterns on the same segment can signal different lexical or grammatical meanings.
translation: Asante Twi uses high and low tone to distinguish meaning.

text: Tonal and segmental differences in Asante/Akuapem mark tense and aspect distinctions; the same verb stem with different tonal or segmental patterns corresponds to different temporal or aspectual interpretations.
translation: Tone and segmental changes on verbs mark tense/aspect in Asante/Akuapem Twi.

text: In Asante Twi orthography, subject pronouns are often written attached to the following verb as a single orthographic unit.
translation: Subject pronouns are written together with verbs in Asante Twi orthography.
